alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Love; Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 2:57PM CST until March 02 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Love County in southern Oklahoma... Marshall County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 256 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Callisburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Durant, Madill, Kingston, Colbert, Thackerville, Silo, Mead, Cartwright, Woodville, Lebanon, Willis, Little City, Lake Texoma, Calera, Oakland and Mcbride. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
